basics.name: Tanveer Khan
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: I'm a software developer with a strong foundation in web development and full-stack projects, particularly focused on React, JavaScript, TypeScript, and the MERN stack. I thrive in collaborative environments, building scalable applications, and constantly improving my backend and DevOps skills.

work.name: Maxxton
work.description: Maxxton is an ERP software provider for vacation rental and hospitality industries.
work.summary: Developed an innovative Content Management System to enhance responsive web design, integrated search, and customizable booking modules, increasing conversion rates by 50%.
highlights: Contributed to over 2 million bookings last year, boosting Maxxtonâ€™s online booking module usage to 53.2%.
Implemented best coding practices to reduce bugs in the codebase.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams in an agile environment to deliver high-quality software.

projects.name: Exercise Web App
projects.description: Developed a user-friendly exercise app using React and Material UI with intuitive navigation and clear visual design.
highlights: Integrated external APIs via Rapid API for real-time exercise data.
Reduced user research time by 50% and improved workout customization.
Ensured the app is responsive and accessible on multiple devices.

projects.name: User Management System
projects.description: Engineered a full-stack CRUD application for dynamic user data management.
highlights: Developed a simple and user-friendly interface using React and CSS.
Implemented axios for efficient database interactions.

references.name: John Doe
references.reference: Tanveer consistently delivers high-quality code and works well in teams. His technical and problem-solving skills are impressive.
